QuestData.Title: Naxxramas and the Fall of Wintergarde
QuestData.Description: Lord Fordragon has led a crushing assault against Arthas at the Wrathgate. In response to this affront, Arthas has sent Naxxramas down upon us. While Kel'Thuzad hides in the floating citadel, his ground commander, Thel'zan, lays siege to Wintergarde Keep. The lower village is already lost and any chance of extracting survivors from the ruins diminishes by the minute.$B$BWe must act quickly! Report to Gryphon Commander Urik at the gryphon station at once! He'll get you up to speed.$B$BLeave me!
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Gryphon Commander Urik at the gryphon station in Wintergarde Keep.
QuestData.RewardText: <Urik points to a gryphon.>$B$BHave you ever ridden one of those? It's simple, friend. Just hop on and tell it where to go.
